metadata.description: This thesaurus is based on the wordnet thesaurus included in the MyThes-1.0 software. A small script was written to extract valid xml from the data files.
metadata.copyright: This thesaurus is provided at no cost by Mark Logic Corporation, subject to the enclosed restrictions.
